title: Question for RimWorld players.
body:
I am doing a tribal mountainous desert run on tough permadeath.... nothing too insane... but I am getting raided every 4ish days by casandra. I have had 2 herd migrations, 2 cargo drops, a 65*C heat wave and 8 raids in 36 days.

How do you deal with that many raids early game as tribal? Let alone on desert where supplies for building are rough to acquire since all trees need to be used for passive coolers and cooking...

Like fml I like a challenge but they just keep sending wave after wave until they get a lucky arrow and explode one of my colonists brains..... I am just a bit salt, but goddamn
